name: Pigeon with Gun
description:
Pigeon with Gun: a retro comedy shooter. Fight crime, trash, and gajillionaires with the help of Fast Furioso, Tank Woman, and Wesley Manpire!

This is the early access version! A more complete version will be uploaded in the near future which early purchasers will get for free!

Featuring - Kate Nyx, Ophidian the Cobra/Fraug, Holly Argent

& Deklynn MacGuffin Productions
